name: apiosk
description: Pay-per-request API access using USDC micropayments on Base. Requires one-time wallet setup.
author: Olivier Brinkman

system.name: jq
system.install: brew install jq (macOS) or apt install jq (Linux)

system.name: bc
system.install: brew install bc (macOS) or apt install bc (Linux)

steps: Fund wallet with USDC on Base (minimum $1-10 for testing)

warnings: Private key is stored in plaintext with restrictive permissions
Only suitable for testing with small amounts ($1-10)
For production, use hardware wallet or external KMS
Private key is NEVER sent to gateway - only wallet address is transmitted
Payments are verified on-chain by the gateway
